name: The Tarot Essentials Kit
description:
The Tarot Essentials Kit Includes:
 1 x Smudge Kit: Protection, healing and spiritual growth
 1 x A Pendulum, intuitively chosen by us
 1 x A Tarot Deck, choose from Rider Waite, Animal Familiar Tarot Cards and Animal Totem Tarot Cards

Looking to explore and learn through divination tools such as tarot cards, crystals and pendulums? This is the perfect kit for you.
 
 The smudge kit will allow you to provide protection and remove and negative energy while giving readings or using your tarot cards or pendulum. The crystals also help with Spiritual growth and enhancing intuition as well as cleansing and clarity.
 
 Smudge Kit: Protection, healing and spiritual growth
 1 x White Sage smudge stick - for removing negative energy
 1 x Palo Santo - for attracting positive energy
 1 x Unpolished Abalone Shell - for calming 
 1 x Amethyst Cluster - for protection and spiritual growth
 1 x Selenite Wand - for cleansing and clarity

Pendulum
 A pendulum is a tool that is used to communicate with spirit via your higher self or your guides. This is one way that you can confidently make decisions based on a precise method. This tool can be used to aid you to make decisions about healing, and is a fast and easy way to get answers to problems. 

What is Tarot Card Reading?
 Tarot card reading is the practice of using tarot cards to gain insight into the past, present or future by formulating a question, then drawing and interpreting cards, essentially using the cards as a divination/intuition tool.
